Articles.Content:
Since SRBs are self contained, does it matter if the burn count is reduced to 1, and the fuel count used to indicate duration?

It doesn't seem to make sense that you have a burn of X, and a fuel count of Y, for a duration of Y/X, when X can be reduced to 1 and fuel then equals duration.
Not right now, maybe. But when they introduce the research mechanic and you can make bigger engines with that same fuel, or research a denser fuel for the same size engine...
